name: Mahjong Christmas Free
description:
Mahjong magic – collect heaps of gifts on Christmas night! Complete over 100 unique levels in 6 locations. Earn points and trophies. Increase your rating and climb the hierarchy ladder.
All trophies will be yours – it’s Christmas!
On this night you can plunge into the magic of the traditional Christmas story in the spirit of Dickens – you have the opportunity to visit six locations and play Mahjong there.
Each level contains golden tiles, which give players more points and ensure victory. This makes the game even more entertaining and adds variety to the level design.
There are levels with wandering golden tiles, which can be completed several times, since the tiles layout is different each time.
Levels are balanced according to the number of suits: there are classic layouts and dynamic layouts as well.

- Christmas Mahjong – collect heaps of gifts on this magic night!
- Over 100 unique levels stuffed with Xmas atmosphere!
- Over 6 hours of gameplay in 6 holiday locations.
- Golden tiles, bonuses and trophies – all this makes the game even more entertaining.
- It isn't just a game - it's a real holiday!
